name: mcp-install-repair-tool
description: A tool to install & repair MCP servers

scripts.test: node -e "const os=require('os'),path=require('path'),fs=require('fs');const testDir=path.join(os.homedir(),'OneDrive','Documents','Cline','MCP','qweather-mcp');fs.existsSync(testDir)&&fs.rmSync(testDir,{recursive:true,force:true});" && npm run build && npm start install https://github.com/overstarry/qweather-mcp
